name: Waverley Software
description:
Waverley is a software engineering company with dedicated development experts in Eastern Europe and Southeast Asia. We build award-winning software products for both renowned tech giants and innovative startups across industries (Robotics, Smart Home, FinTech, Healthcare, etc.). We also provide seasoned dedicated development teams for enterprises to augment their internal teams’ capabilities. 
We are experts in:
Software architecture
IoT & Robotics products
DevOps & Cloud
Blockchain & tokenization
AI & Machine Learning
Mobile/web apps
Enterprise software
UI/UX Design
Software testing 
What makes us special:
US-based C-Suite, global engineering talent
63% senior staff, 20% of team members have Ph.D. degrees
27 years of experience in software engineering
90% chance that we’ve worked with your technology stack
80% of client partnerships last longer than 1 year
 We are listed in:
Top 1 Custom Software Developers in Vietnam by Clutch, 2019
Top 5 Mobile App Development Companies in Ukraine by AllAboutApps, 2019
Top 10 NodeJS Developers in Ukraine by Clutch, 2019
Top 15 IoT Companies Globally by Clutch, 2019
Top 15 IoT Development Companies Globally by The Manifest, 2019
Top 15 Blockchain Companies Globally by The Manifest, 2019
Top 25 Software Developers in Ukraine by Clutch, 2019
Top 25 NodeJS Developers Globally by Clutch, 2019
Top 50 Blockchain Development Companies Globally by TechReviewer, 2019
